comment: Earthy, mild....not much else to say.

I was excited to try something made in state but was disappointed.  The flavor was very oaky and had too much tannin and leather flavor for my taste.  it has a distinct taste that was off putting to me and it lingers afterward. Apparently it is made with 23% malted barley which might be the cause.  Medium amount of heat and slightly oily feel.    Would not recommend.
